ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear
ygData.msgSnippet: ditch the lambent bp and go buy a phase spider carapace, they re going for dirt cheap these days in bazaar and they ve got respectable stats. I was using one
ygData.messageBody:
ditch the lambent bp and go buy a phase spider carapace, they're going for
dirt cheap these days in bazaar and they've got respectable stats. I was
using one till i got my vindi bp

Minkin
A Ro



-----Original Message-----
From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
Sent: September 10, 2002 2:55 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] 51+ bard gear


Hi all,
I am returning to Norrath after a looong break.
I just bought Luclin and is in desperate need of equipment upgrades. I plan
to try and dump some of my junk at the bazaar, but need some advice on what
to buy and what to pay :)

My standard gear is as follows:
- Singing steel boots
- Singing steel Gauntlets
- Sleeves of the Ancient
- Lambent BreastPlate
- Lambent Greaves
- 2x Opaline Earrings
- 2x Velium fire wedding rings
- Guardian helmet
- Spider fur coat
- Troll Hide belt
- Orc Fang necklace
Weapons:
- Journey mans walking stick
- Icepaw war claw
- Sarnak Skull splitter
- Smoldering brand

I have a bunch of junk to sell apart from the above mentioned thigns and
around 1700pp in cash.. I think I maybe can raise 3000pp if Im lucky :/
Any suggestions for what to upgrade and what to pay for the upgrades will be
greatly appriciated..

Regards
Musiker, Minstrel of 51 songs

> will need to

> reasonable hour. Being on EST, that means I have to go about
> the time we get
> really started in VT or wherever. Songs are the only thing I
> care about
> having though so it's back to grind, I suppose.
